description: Mega Man X: Command Mission is a turn-based RPG set in the Mega Man X universe.

V0.1.0.description:
## Mega Man X Command Mission INITIAL ALPHA RELEASE!!

The first ever randomizer and Archipelago for Mega Man X Command Mission is officially here! 
For: Gamecube (PAL ISO) 

Please make sure to follow all setup instructions in order to properly patch, connect , and enjoy the game! 

A YAML has been provided for easy access and ready to play-  player options! Make sure to put this in your players folder!

WARNING: You MUST connect the client to the Archipelago server immediately before loading ANY patched MMX Command Mission rom! Failure to do so will cause many bugs and issues. 

See this file for ALL Instructions regarding this randomizer, as well as win condition and what is randomized: 
https://github.com/themogulAP/ArchipelagoCM/blob/main/worlds/commandmission/docs/en_Mega%20Man%20X%20Command%20Mission%20Instructions.md

See this file for ALL Setup required for setting up and playing this Archipelago! 
https://github.com/themogulAP/ArchipelagoCM/blob/main/worlds/commandmission/docs/setup_en.md



KNOWN ISSUES: 
- Upon defeating Chapter 2 boss: Wild Jango as the 2nd - 9th boss: this will cause NPCs and other characters to turn red. 
(This is fixed by re-entering the helipad location in Central Tower).

- Names for items received will be vanilla in game: But they WILL show up as the randomized item in their respective inventory... 
I.e. X Buster will automatically be in the weapons tab, Build Power will be in consumable tab, etc. 

- Having maximum Sub Tank will cause sub tank location checks to not be acquired. 
Booting the client and connecting will FIX this and many other things! Also be sure to use sub tanks, as they are permanent! 

-Different NPCs will spawn at various times, i.e. multiple Massimo in the Base Command Room. This will not cause ANY gameplay issues.
V0.1.0.title: Mega Man X Command Mission AP V0.1.0

## Mega Man X Command Mission INITIAL ALPHA RELEASE!!
The first ever randomizer and Archipelago for Mega Man X Command Mission is officially here!
For: Gamecube (PAL ISO)

Please make sure to follow all setup instructions in order to properly patch, connect , and enjoy the game!

A YAML has been provided for easy access and ready to play- player options! Make sure to put this in your players folder!

## WARNING: You MUST connect the client to the Archipelago server immediately before loading ANY patched MMX Command Mission rom! Failure to do so will cause many bugs and issues.

See this file for ALL Instructions regarding this randomizer, as well as win condition and what is randomized:
https://github.com/themogulAP/ArchipelagoCM/blob/main/worlds/commandmission/docs/en_Mega%20Man%20X%20Command%20Mission%20Instructions.md

Upon defeating Chapter 2 boss: Wild Jango as the 2nd - 9th boss: this will cause NPCs and other characters to turn red.

V0.1.5-CharacterUpdate.description:
## Mega Man X Command Mission CHARACTER RANDOMIZATION RELEASE (Alpha)!!
The first ever randomizer and Archipelago for Mega Man X Command Mission is officially here!
For: Gamecube (PAL ISO)

Please make sure to follow all setup instructions in order to properly patch, connect , and enjoy the game!

A YAML has been provided for easy access and ready to play- player options! Make sure to put this in your players folder!

## WARNING: You MUST connect the client to the Archipelago server immediately before loading ANY patched MMX Command Mission rom! Failure to do so will cause many bugs and issues.
---This is becoming less and less prevalent as more releases come out: eventually this will not be necessary!

See this file for ALL Instructions regarding this randomizer, as well as win condition and what is randomized:
https://github.com/themogulAP/ArchipelagoCM/blob/main/worlds/commandmission/docs/en_Mega%20Man%20X%20Command%20Mission%20Instructions.md

See this file for ALL Setup required for setting up and playing this Archipelago!
https://github.com/themogulAP/ArchipelagoCM/blob/main/worlds/commandmission/docs/setup_en.md


KNOWN ISSUES:

Upon defeating Chapter 2 boss: Wild Jango as the 2nd - 9th boss: this will cause NPCs and other characters to turn red.
(This is fixed by re-entering the helipad location in Central Tower).
You can also fix this by saving and reloading your game!

Names for items received will be vanilla in game: But they WILL show up as the randomized item in their respective inventory...
I.e. X Buster will automatically be in the weapons tab, Build Power will be in consumable tab, etc.

NEW CONTENT:
-All Characters are now Randomized in game! Depending on who you choose as your starting character, the other 6 will be fully findable in any location in the world! 
An example YAML has been provided with it set to Cinnamon.... using the "generate template options" in the launcher will default back to X! 

## CHANGES:
FIXED Teleport Issues - when getting Access Code, it will now permanently make the correct changes as long as the Client is connected.
---You can also now correctly SAVE your game, without having to restart chapter flags, or lose any level ups, items, etc. 

Fixed Chapter 2 bugs - specifically in Chief R being kidnapped room, a door being locked unintentionally, and some weird error messages (doesnt block gameplay).

Chapter 6 Key Items are fixed! They will no longer be given at their vanilla locations and must be earned via the AP World!
V0.1.5-CharacterUpdate.title: Mega Man X Command Mission V0.1.5 - Character Update!

V0.1.6.title: Mega Man X Command Mission V0.1.6 - Laser Update!

V0.1.61.description:
## Mega Man X Command Mission CHARACTER RANDOMIZATION RELEASE (Alpha)!!
The first ever randomizer and Archipelago for Mega Man X Command Mission is officially here!
For: Gamecube (PAL ISO)

Please make sure to follow all setup instructions in order to properly patch, connect , and enjoy the game!

A YAML has been provided for easy access and ready to play- player options! Make sure to put this in your players folder!

## Make sure to report any issues in the Discord Channel in the Archipelago server! 

## WARNING: You MUST connect the client to the Archipelago server immediately before loading ANY patched MMX Command Mission rom! Failure to do so will cause many bugs and issues.
---This is becoming less and less prevalent as more releases come out: eventually this will not be necessary!

See this file for ALL Instructions regarding this randomizer, as well as win condition and what is randomized:
https://github.com/themogulAP/ArchipelagoCM/blob/main/worlds/commandmission/docs/en_Mega%20Man%20X%20Command%20Mission%20Instructions.md

See this file for ALL Setup required for setting up and playing this Archipelago!
https://github.com/themogulAP/ArchipelagoCM/blob/main/worlds/commandmission/docs/setup_en.md


KNOWN ISSUES:

Upon defeating Chapter 2 boss: Wild Jango as the 2nd - 9th boss: this will cause NPCs and other characters to turn red.
(This is fixed by re-entering the helipad location in Central Tower).
You can also fix this by saving and reloading your game!

Names for items received will be vanilla in game: But they WILL show up as the randomized item in their respective inventory...
I.e. X Buster will automatically be in the weapons tab, Build Power will be in consumable tab, etc.

## Bug Fixes:
-- Marino weapons have all been fixed. 

-- Vanillia Desert will no longer be opened initially and the code will need to be acquired. 

-- Chapter 5 Softlock (preventing going back down Zero's room Elevator) has been fixed. 

- FIXED Teleport Issues - This should be less and less of an issue as time progresses. If the teleport "access granted" patching does not work... Save your game and reload your save to fix this! 

- Chapter 2 bugs should now be very few and far between. Report any you might find! 

- Chapter 6 items should now be working properly. No more writing from vanilla - especially for pickaxes, booster parts, and Electric Components. 

- Reduced item #s to prevent the check lockout. If this persists, its an easy fix so report if it happens! 

QOL:
- Green Blockers in chapter 7 for items on the top level have been removed. 
- CHAPTER 9 LASERS ARE FIXED. You will now only have to fight each laser once... and they should stay yellow. Plus, all doors in Chapter 9 are unlocked for more ease of access. 

For Next Release:
- Still digging into more Level/power scaling so we can bring back the tails clan, and rafflesian. Plus this would alleviate the going to chapter 9 first issue / difficulty. 

- I will start to look at the chapter 5 alarm. I can currently turn it off, but the reploids block exits.
V0.1.61.title: Mega Man X Command Mission V0.1.61

V0.1.62.description:
## Mega Man X Command Mission CHARACTER RANDOMIZATION RELEASE (Alpha)!!
The first ever randomizer and Archipelago for Mega Man X Command Mission is officially here!
For: Gamecube (PAL ISO)

Please make sure to follow all setup instructions in order to properly patch, connect , and enjoy the game!

A YAML has been provided for easy access and ready to play- player options! Make sure to put this in your players folder!

## Make sure to report any issues in the Discord Channel in the Archipelago server! 

## WARNING: You MUST connect the client to the Archipelago server immediately before loading ANY patched MMX Command Mission rom! Failure to do so will cause many bugs and issues.
---This is becoming less and less prevalent as more releases come out: eventually this will not be necessary!

See this file for ALL Instructions regarding this randomizer, as well as win condition and what is randomized:
https://github.com/themogulAP/ArchipelagoCM/blob/main/worlds/commandmission/docs/en_Mega%20Man%20X%20Command%20Mission%20Instructions.md

See this file for ALL Setup required for setting up and playing this Archipelago!
https://github.com/themogulAP/ArchipelagoCM/blob/main/worlds/commandmission/docs/setup_en.md


KNOWN ISSUES:

Upon defeating Chapter 2 boss: Wild Jango as the 2nd - 9th boss: this will cause NPCs and other characters to turn red.
(This is fixed by re-entering the helipad location in Central Tower).
You can also fix this by saving and reloading your game!

Names for items received will be vanilla in game: But they WILL show up as the randomized item in their respective inventory...
I.e. X Buster will automatically be in the weapons tab, Build Power will be in consumable tab, etc.

## Bug Fixes:
- Reduced item #s further to prevent the check lockout. If this persists, its an easy fix so report if it happens! 

- Completely reworked how the Chapter 10 Access Door is worked. The code will now correctly check for 9 medals and the Far East HQ Access Code to open the door permanently. Previously, this was resetting on Save and Quit... but it shouldnt have any matter now. 

QOL:
- Door before Central Tower Key Door is permanently unlocked.
- Some barriers have been removed to allow access to a further Treasure Token location in Chapter 2. 

WIP:
- Treasure Tokens added as location options. (Currently up to Chapter 4 is done, but not implemented). 

For Next Few Releases:
1) Complete the Treasure Token Locations and set them as options for the YAML. 
(After these are working, then its time for ALL the sky room cosmetics.) 

- Still digging into more Level/power scaling so we can bring back the tails clan, and rafflesian. Plus this would alleviate the going to chapter 9 first issue / difficulty. 

- Looking into Item shop stuff to possibly include shop sanity in the future. 

- More QoL: Like Chapter 5 Alarm. A potential warp reset from anywhere, etc.
V0.1.62.title: Mega Man X Command Mission V0.1.62 Door HOTFIX!

V0.1.6r2.description:
## Mega Man X Command Mission CHARACTER RANDOMIZATION RELEASE (Alpha)!!
The first ever randomizer and Archipelago for Mega Man X Command Mission is officially here!
For: Gamecube (PAL ISO)

Please make sure to follow all setup instructions in order to properly patch, connect , and enjoy the game!

A YAML has been provided for easy access and ready to play- player options! Make sure to put this in your players folder!

## Make sure to report any issues in the Discord Channel in the Archipelago server! 

## WARNING: You MUST connect the client to the Archipelago server immediately before loading ANY patched MMX Command Mission rom! Failure to do so will cause many bugs and issues.
---This is becoming less and less prevalent as more releases come out: eventually this will not be necessary!

See this file for ALL Instructions regarding this randomizer, as well as win condition and what is randomized:
https://github.com/themogulAP/ArchipelagoCM/blob/main/worlds/commandmission/docs/en_Mega%20Man%20X%20Command%20Mission%20Instructions.md

See this file for ALL Setup required for setting up and playing this Archipelago!
https://github.com/themogulAP/ArchipelagoCM/blob/main/worlds/commandmission/docs/setup_en.md


KNOWN ISSUES:

Upon defeating Chapter 2 boss: Wild Jango as the 2nd - 9th boss: this will cause NPCs and other characters to turn red.
(This is fixed by re-entering the helipad location in Central Tower).
You can also fix this by saving and reloading your game!

Names for items received will be vanilla in game: But they WILL show up as the randomized item in their respective inventory...
I.e. X Buster will automatically be in the weapons tab, Build Power will be in consumable tab, etc.

NEW CONTENT:
-All Characters are now Randomized in game! You can now start with whatever character you want... and they will NEVER leave the party! 
In the future: there will be random functionality in the YAML. 

An example YAML has been provided with it set to Cinnamon.... using the "generate template options" in the launcher will default back to X! 

## CHANGES:
- FIXED Teleport Issues - This should be less and less of an issue as time progresses. If the teleport "access granted" patching does not work... Save your game and reload your save to fix this! 

- Chapter 2 bugs should now be very few and far between. Report any you might find! 

- Mechaniloid Items are now fixed properly: there should be no more shenanigans with writing the vanilla item to inventory, or funky save reloading! 

- Chapter 6 items should now be working properly. No more writing from vanilla - especially for pickaxes, booster parts, and Electric Components. 

- Queen of Clubs was set to the wrong ID... now fixed to display the right weapon! 

- "Fake" Central Key has been fixed and will now only give to the player at the AP-inspired location. 

- Fixed potential issues with runs being stuck due to the Keys: Lagrano, Melda, etc. 

- Reduced item #s to prevent the check lockout. If this persists, its an easy fix so report if it happens! 

QOL:
- Green Blockers in chapter 7 for items on the top level have been removed. 
- CHAPTER 9 LASERS ARE FIXED. You will now only have to fight each laser once... and they should stay yellow. Plus, all doors in Chapter 9 are unlocked for more ease of access. 

For Next Release:
- Still digging into more Level/power scaling so we can bring back the tails clan, and rafflesian. Plus this would alleviate the going to chapter 9 first issue / difficulty. 

- I will start to look at the chapter 5 alarm. I can currently turn it off, but the reploids block exits.
V0.1.6r2.title: Mega Man X Command Mission V0.1.6 - HOTFIX

V0.1.7.description:
## Mega Man X Command Mission CHARACTER RANDOMIZATION RELEASE (Alpha)!!
The first ever randomizer and Archipelago for Mega Man X Command Mission is officially here!
For: Gamecube (PAL ISO)

Please make sure to follow all setup instructions in order to properly patch, connect , and enjoy the game!

A YAML has been provided for easy access and ready to play- player options! Make sure to put this in your players folder!

## Make sure to report any issues in the Discord Channel in the Archipelago server! 

See this file for ALL Instructions regarding this randomizer, as well as win condition and what is randomized:
https://github.com/themogulAP/ArchipelagoCM/blob/main/worlds/commandmission/docs/en_Mega%20Man%20X%20Command%20Mission%20Instructions.md

See this file for ALL Setup required for setting up and playing this Archipelago!
https://github.com/themogulAP/ArchipelagoCM/blob/main/worlds/commandmission/docs/setup_en.md


KNOWN ISSUES:

Sometimes after the player receives an "Access Code"... the game will seemingly not teleport to the correct new area unlocked. 
This is completely fixed by saving and reloading your game!

Names for items received will be vanilla in game: But they WILL show up as the randomized item in their respective inventory...
I.e. X Buster will automatically be in the weapons tab, Build Power will be in consumable tab, etc.

## Bug Fixes:
- Chapter 6 Pickaxes and Mining Trades have been fully removed from randomization. This will prevent any further softlocking shenanigans from happening. 

- ENCOUNTER RATE OFF is now completely fixed! Choosing this YAML option will now permanently remove all random encounters. 
(The option for lower and higher is still being worked out!) 

- Reduced item #s further to prevent the check lockout. If this persists, its an easy fix so report if it happens! 

WIP:
- Treasure Tokens are complete up to the start of Gaudile Laboratory. Assuming this patch doesnt have any ground-breaking new issues, the next APworld will be the treasure token update!

-Level scaling is going to be a long process, but it is being worked on!
V0.1.7.title: Mega Man X Command Mission V0.1.7 - Encounter Rate FIX!
